comments.body: Since you're already touching this function, you could change this to `nn.batch_normalization` (`nn.batch_norm_with_global_normalization` is deprecated).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +80,84 @@    mean, variance = control_flow_ops.cond(is_training, _update_mean_var,
                                           lambda: (moving_mean, moving_var))
    return nn.batch_norm_with_global_normalization(
        tensor_in,
        mean,
